title: What are some information about Sunghoon, the new I-Land Show's trainee? - Quora

response.answer_text: Park Sunghoon is a former professional figure skater which helps him do the difficult spins and jumps in dancing. He is called the ice Prince and said to be the most good looking one in the group. He used to find it difficult to act cute but thanks to Sunoo he is now a pro, as well as Heeseung. Vocalist and dancer. December 8th 2002. He was also a BigHit trainee. He was a 2 time national silver medal and represented South Korea in many international competitions. He started figure skating at the age of 9 but left it to pursue his dream of being an idol. I'm also guessing he's ur bias? 😅
